WITH air_a AS ( SELECT CNT_NAME, APT_CODE FROM AIRPORT ), air_b AS ( SELECT CNT_NAME, APT_CODE , APT_NAME FROM AIRPORT ), air_c as ( select AIR_CODE , AIR_NAME from AIRCRAFT ) SELECT s.*, air_a.CNT_NAME AS 출발_국가, air_b.CNT_NAME AS 도착_국가 , air_b.APT_NAME as 도착_항공 , air_c.AIR_NAME FROM AIR_ROUTE_SCHEDULE s LEFT JOIN air_a ON s.DPT_APT_CODE = air_a.APT_CODE LEFT JOIN air_b ON s.ARR_APT_CODE = air_b.APT_CODE LEFT JOIN air_c ON s.AIR_CODE = air_c.AIR_CODE WHERE s.FLT_CODE = #{fltCode}
